tika.dc.description: Based on the author's twenty-five years of first-hand experience, this engaging book reveals what Islam really teaches and how today's Muslims live and think. With practical information and personal stories, Carl Medearis shows readers how they can build life-changing bridges between the world's two largest religions—one person at a time, whether in the US or elsewhere.
dc.subject: Christianity and other religions—Islam
Islam—Relations—Christianity
Islam—Doctrines
